column1: Little Goat Diner////Made reservation for a bunch of my girlfriends for brunch. Looking forward to see if my experience will be better this time around. We were given water right away
column2: Â greeted within 5 minutes by the waiter
column4: I was quite optimistic. I ordered the "little piggy went to china" breakfast that according to the menu has sunny side up eggs...which can really be made over easy
column6: I wasn't asked by the server. My food arrives and though smelled delicious
column7: my egg whites were still CLEAR. Granted I wish they were more specific as to how cooked this sunny side up egg would be
column8: but the fact that I'm pregnant and cannot eat uncooked eggs was really bothering me. So I asked the waiter if there's anyway I can have the eggs more cooked and this is what he says:
